changeSet.author: WenhongZhu
changeSet.sql: alter table credit_card_payment_instrument alter column credit_card_type_id type varchar(64) using credit_card_type_id; ALTER TABLE credit_card_payment_instrument ALTER COLUMN credit_card_type_id DROP NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: WenhongZhu
changeSet.sql:
create table facebook_payment_account_mapping( map_id bigint not null, user_id bigint not null, fb_payment_account_id varchar(128) not null, resource_age bigint not null, created_time timestamp not null, created_by varchar(64) null, updated_time timestamp null, updated_by varchar(64) null,
constraint facebook_payment_account_mapping_pk primary key (map_id) );

changeSet.author: WenhongZhu
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE payment_instrument ADD COLUMN payment_provider_id int;

changeSet.sql: delete from payment_provider; delete from merchant_account;
